ygData.subject: Re: Spell components
ygData.msgSnippet: just to let everone know, i got PAGE 27, and i got it in Kiticor woods, there are some orcs that spawn somewhere in there, i dont know where i was, but there
ygData.messageBody:
just to let everone know, i got PAGE 27, and i got it in Kiticor woods,
there are some orcs that spawn somewhere in there, i dont know where i was,
but there are 3 of them, and they all have the same last name, one is a
captian, the other is a spell caster, and another jsut has a name. the spell
caster had it on him.

-Aeramus

----- Original Message -----
From: Miller, Keith A. <keithm@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 3:46 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Spell components


> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> First of all, you mean research components, not spell components. They
are
> book pages, and can be found anywhere the other magic classes research
> components are found, ie as loot on critters. As to which critters,
> confirmed sightings are
> Unrest monsters
> goblin warriors
>
> There are others im sure, but these are ones I know of.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: duffjc@... [mailto:duffjc@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 2:39 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Spell components
>
>
> From: duffjc@...
>
> Please forgive my ignorance if this topic was alread covered but, has
anyone
> foound where to get the spell components for an enchanter. I think they
are
> words or something?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Duff
